name: COALITION OF RECYCLERS OF RESIDUAL ORGANICS BY PRACTITIONER OF SUSTAINABILITY
description: Treatment and management of biosolids uses
sampleDescriptions: Supporting development of policies to protect safe uses of biosolids and composted materials
Support of PFAS source control rulemaking mandates and validated risk assessment models related to biosolids Provision of liability exemption from CERCLA liability related to PFAS hazardous substance

Monitoring of PFAS Biosolids risk assessment analysis related to impacts upon land application related to agricultural properties.
